questions.question: When is your first submission of your project due?

choices.answer: Tuesday, Sept. 15 by end of day
Tuesday, Sept. 15 by beginning of class
Thursday, Sept. 17 by end of day
Thursday, Sept. 17 by beginning of class

questions.question: What needs to be included with your project?

choices.answer: An annotated photo and written rationale
A photo and written rationale
My identity web
An essay and photo

questions.question: Where do you submit the assignment?

choices.answer: In my Learner Portfolio.
The photo goes in Learner Portfolio and my rationale in Google Classroom.
To the posted assignment in Google Classroom.
I email the assignment to Ms. Liz.

questions.question: What choices do you have for selecting your photo?

choices.answer: I must include my ancestors and myself
I must include a photo of myself
myself, my ancestors, and/or another symbolic representation of my identity
I must include a photo of my ancestors

questions.question: What question do you answer when analyzing your annotations?

choices.answer: Why I chose the title
Why the photo is important to me
How the photo relates to Wendy Red Star
How the annotation represents my identity and how I used creative process

questions.question: What does it mean to include context to my annotations?

choices.answer: Context is explaining background information
Context is answering the analysis questions
Context is directly quoting my annotations
Context is my conclusion
Absolutely! I can't wait to get started!
I'll let you know once I begin.
I am just not sure yet.
I dread being creative.
